chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign (umpl_conv_0 s) sigma

Premises:
state_correct_wrt_sign = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma a = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
umpl_conv_0 = fix umpl_conv_0 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_0 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_0 p0) (umpl_conv_0 p1) end : state -> state
signature = Map nat : Set
st_compat_check_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), st_compat_check s sigma = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma
st_compat_check_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> st_compat_check s sigma = true
states_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (s s' : state), state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma -> state_correct_wrt_sign s' sigma -> st_compatible s s'
umpl_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (umpl_conv_0 s) sigma pa
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_compat_check d sigma = true
dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_compat_check d sigma = true
predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
st_compat_check_0_complete : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa
st_compat_check_0_correct : forall (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma s = true
st_compat_check = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) => st_compat_check_0 pre_ad_empty sigma s : state -> signature -> bool
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad), state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list s0 s1) sigma pa -> state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s0 sigma (pre_ad_O pa) /\ state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset s1 sigma (pre_ad_I pa)
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset = fun (s : state) (sigma : signature) (pa : pre_ad) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> exists n : nat, MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) = Some n /\ pl_tl_length p n : state -> signature -> pre_ad -> Prop
predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature -> bool
union_semantics : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature) (t : term), DTA_main_state_correct d0 -> DTA_main_state_correct d1 -> DTA_ref_ok d0 -> DTA_ref_ok d1 -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> reconnait d0 t \/ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (union d0 d1) t
u_conv_0_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0
u_conv_0_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
st_compat_check_0 = fix st_compat_check_0 (pa : pre_ad) (sigma : signature) (s : state) {struct s} : bool := match s with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ a p => match pl_compat_check p with | Some n => match MapGet nat sigma (pre_ad_concat pa a) with | Some m => n =? m | None => false end | None => false end | @M2 _ x y => st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x && st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_I pa) sigma y end : pre_ad -> signature -> state -> bool
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop

```coq
intros s sigma H.
unfold state_correct_wrt_sign.
intros a p Hp.
pose (u_conv_0_invar_1 s a p) as Hs.
destruct Hs as [p' Hp'].
rewrite Hp' in Hp.
pose (umpl_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 s sigma a) as Hcompat.
apply Hcompat.
apply H.
Qed.
```

original: intros s sigma H. unfold state_correct_wrt_sign. intros a p Hp. pose (u_conv_0_invar_1 s a p) as Hs. destruct Hs as [p' Hp']. rewrite Hp' in Hp. pose (umpl_conv_0_correct_wrt_sign_invar_0 s sigma a) as Hcompat. apply Hcompat. apply H.
